price: Lalle ne sũ, bã zã su wadãtar da kai da kõme ba daga Allah. Kuma lalle ne azzãlumai sãshensu majiɓintan sãshe ne. Kuma Allah ne Majiɓincin mãsu taƙawa.
arabic: إِنَّهُمۡ لَن يُغۡنُواْ عَنكَ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيۡـٔٗاۚ وَإِنَّ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ بَعۡضُهُمۡ أَوۡلِيَآءُ بَعۡضٖۖ وَٱللَّهُ وَلِيُّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innahum lan yugh'nū ʿanka mina al-lahi shayan wa-inna al-ẓālimīna baʿḍuhum awliyāu baʿḍin wal-lahu waliyyu al-mutaqīna
